mapper.sql: id, cn_name, en_name, level_id, country_id, keyword, deleted, operator, insert_time, update_time
mapper.select: select p.id, p.cn_name, p.en_name, p.level_id, p.country_id,p.keyword, h.countryFullName, p.deleted, p.operator, p.insert_time, p.update_time from politics_religion as p , hs_country_new as h where p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.deleted = 0 and p.country_id = h.number

select p.id, p.cn_name, p.en_name, p.level_id, p.country_id,p.keyword, h.countryFullName, p.deleted, p.operator, p.insert_time, p.update_time from politics_religion as p , hs_country_new as h
deleted = 0
AND p.country_id = h.number
AND `cn_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cnName},'%')
AND `en_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{enName},'%')
AND country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: update politics_religion set deleted = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into politics_religion
id,
cn_name,
en_name,
level_id,
country_id,
keyword,
deleted,
operator,
insert_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{levelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update politics_religion
cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleted = 0

update politics_religion set cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_id = #{levelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
